incidents.name: Issue With Netnumber OSR Impacting Toll-Free and 10DLC Provisioning/Cancellations

incident_updates.body: We are still investigating an issue with Netnumber OSR impacting toll-free and 10DLC provisioning/cancellations. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating an issue with Netnumber OSR impacting toll-free and 10DLC provisioning/cancellations. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Digitel Network in Venezuela. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Digitel Network in Venezuela. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to Multiple Networks in Bangladesh

incident_updates.body: We continue monitoring successful SMS deliveries to the Robi network in Bangladesh. However, we continue to experience SMS delivery failures when sending messages over Grameen network in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue monitoring successful SMS deliveries to the Robi network in Bangladesh. However, we continue to experience SMS delivery failures when sending messages over Grameen network in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue monitoring successful SMS deliveries to the Robi network in Bangladesh. However, we continue to experience SMS delivery failures when sending messages over Grameen network in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

However, we continue to experience SMS delivery failures when sending messages over Grameen Network in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently monitoring successful SMS deliveries to the Robi network in Bangladesh. However, we continue to experience SMS delivery failures when sending messages over Grameen Network in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently monitoring successful SMS deliveries to the Robi network in Bangladesh. However, we continue to experience SMS delivery failures when sending messages over Grameen Network in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing successful SMS delivery to Robi Network in Bangladesh and we are currently monitoring it. We are also experiencing SMS delivery failures when sending messages over Grameen Network in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing successful SMS delivery to Robi Network in Bangladesh and we are currently monitoring it. We are also experiencing SMS delivery failures when sending messages over Grameen Network in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue causing SMS Delivery failurs sending to   Robi Network in Bangladesh and are working with our partner carrier to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have detected that Multiple Networks are experiencing SMS delivery failures in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery failures sending to Robi Network in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destinations Account Security Service Partner Maintenance - Vodafone

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 July 2024 at 03:00 PDT until 24 July 2024 at 07:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following carrier and countries: Vodafone Germany, Vodafone Italy, Vodafone Spain, Vodafone United Kingdom.

Impacted Product: Verify Silent Network Auth

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body: The Megafon/Yota network in Russia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 24 July 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 24 July 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Megafon/Yota Russia handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 July 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 24 July 2024 at 19:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from and to Twilio France phone numbers.

The Motiv network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 July 2024 at 15:20 PDT until 24 July 2024 at 18:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Motiv Russia handsets.

The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting planned maintenance on Saturday, August 3rd, 2024, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours. During the maintenance window, Insights Historical Dashboards will be unavailable, and any scheduled ETLs will be affected.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Authy and Verify V1 API - Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Were conducting a planned Global maintenance between 15:00 to 15:30 Pacific Time on 08/03/2024. During the maintenance window, all Authy API requests will fail. Communicate to your customers (end users) about this planned downtime for maintenance before August 3, 2024. Due to Authy APIs deprecation (https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/authy-vs-verify), we strongly encourage migrating to the Verify V2 API. Verify V2 API, specifically SMS/Voice OTP delivery, is unaffected by this maintenance downtime.

Twilio is conducting planned maintenance from 16 Aug 13:00 until 16 Aug 20:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Frankfurt, Germany (DE1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact to services with Interconnects in DE1.

Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 Aug 13:00 until 16 Aug 20:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Frankfurt, Germany (DE1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact on calls to and from Europe.

Twilio is conducting planned maintenance from 17 Aug 15:00 until 17 Aug 20:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Frankfurt, Germany (DE1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact to services with Interconnects in DE1.

Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 17 Aug 15:00 until 17 Aug 20:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Frankfurt, Germany (DE1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact on calls to and from Europe.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
